text: Day is the most civic thing there is. No one can deny that to me. During the day, people and houses are on the streets and the street strips are ticked. There are trams, cars, cars, etc. But the night  ah! Oh, my God! The night is the most uneducated thing known to date. The night is fine in the bushes. The night  primitive  wild  reluctant to civilization  is the last remaining savagery in the world. Won't there be anyone to colonize the night? FIN Poetic Anthology, 2006
title: La noche
author: Luis Vidales
